Whittier.California University of Business and Te: The California University of Business and Technology is an unaccredited institution of higher learning located in Hacienda Heights, California in the United States approved by the California Bureau for Private Postsecondary Education. Programs include Bachelor of Business Administration (BBA), Master of Business Administration (MBA), and professional Doctorate of Business Administration (DBA), Master of Arts in Computer Information Systems (MACIS), Master of Arts in Education (MAEd), and Doctor of Education (EdD).
